answers.answer: HI,Birth control can be one of the reasons for recurrent yeast infection. You should also check for UTI, STD and diabetes. Consult your Doctor. Hope this helps.Take care and good luck.

question: At the beginning of the summer in 2012 I went on the pill to help with my PCOS. I have gotten 3 yeast infections since December. Could my birth control pill be making me more likely to get yeast infections?
title: Birth Control Pill Causing Yeast Infections?
